documentation.text:
@dev Gets all friends for the caller.
 @return An array of friend objects with address, username, and displayName.

devdoc.details: A smart contract for managing user relationships including friendships, removals, and blocking.

addFriend(address).details: Adds a user as a friend after a friend request has been accepted.

params._friend: The address of the user to become friends with.

blockUser(address).details: Blocks a user, ending the relationship.

params._blockedUser: The address of the user to block.

constructor.details: Constructor that sets the address of the UserRegistery contract.

params._usersContractAddress: The address of the UserRegistery contract.

getAllFriends().details: Gets all friends for the caller.

returns._0: An array of friend objects with address, username, and displayName.

removeFriend(address).details: Removes a user as a friend.

params._formerFriend: The address of the user to remove as a friend.
